DesignDecision.Description: Roundabout algorithm for safety diversion is currently implemented for two drones only.
Simulation state (i.e. virtual or physical) is set in a singleton class and can only be set once.
Flight simulation for virtual drones is managed entirely by the virtual drone. There is no central drone simulation component.
All coordinates are specified in degrees for easy interface with MavLink and GoogleMaps
RTK will be used to increase drone accuracy to within 8 cm.
